Visual Basic NET: If a = b Then     ' equal End If

C#: if (a != b)      // not equal   Or if (!(a == b))      // not equal
Visual Basic NET: If a <> b Then     ' not equal End If  Or If Not a = b Then     ' not equal End If
If a = b And c = d Or e = f Then     ' nonshortcircuiting boolean operators End If
